nodes.text: The Trinith system was a star system located within the galaxy. This system was the original home of the Trinthan prowler, with the feline predator eventually being bred across the galaxy due to its prowess with hunting and tracking. The Galactic Republic would later ban the breeding of the species, and the system's native predator could be found across a number of worlds, including Quesh as a result of being released into the wild.
